subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Catriona Matthew won the Scandinavian T.P.C. yesterday, shooting a four-under-par 68 and beating Laura Diaz and Sophie Gustafson by three shots in Loddekopinge, Sweden. Matthew finished with a nine-under 279 for her fifth victory. Annika Sorenstam, the defending champion and tournament host, closed with a 68 for her best round of the tournament and moved to 9th from 21st.
